title: Kantai Collection - Twitter Summary (Doujinshi)
description:
A collection of images from Twitter
"The artist has never given the story a proper name so "Story of a certain Ikazuchi" is taken from the one of the replies to his Tweets. The name was taken because the artist rejected notions of "World Line" in his works, so Shipgirls from his works are essentially dups living in different parts of the same cruel world." - 岬ちゃん

related.title: Kantai Collection - Akatsuki of the Slum (Doujinshi)
